text: I'm more than 50 years old I've lived
through lots of course it has always
been bombing and shelling that's not new
but it's never been like this
there has been no electricity for two
years no wages for a year and no food
has come in for six months people have
been chopping up their bedroom furniture
to use it as a fuel when we cook food
it's bits of meat in water there is no
flour we've had to make our flour from
bird seeds that is not even fit for
human consumption I go to the hospital a
lot there is big shortage in medicines
I've seen them operate on women and
children without painkillers their
screams reach the sky because of the
bombing 10 mosques and 100 houses have
been destroyed a lot of them still have
the people inside the government say
they've created safe corridors it's a
lie some family run towards the army
when they saw them come close but then
they arrested them and we haven't heard
from them since we are stuck between
going to force that will arrest us or
worse or between staying here awaiting
for deaths
